title: REACH Essentials Toothbrush with Toothbrush Caps, Multi-Zoned Angled Soft Bristles, Contoured Handle, Tongue Scraper, 6 Count
description: REACH Essentials Toothbrushes effectively clean the hard-to-reach places in the back of your mouth. Apart from removing plaque deep between the teeth and along the gum line, this toothbrush’s angled neck and soft bristles allow for a more comprehensive clean. On the back is a tongue scraper to eliminate bad breath causing bacteria. This toothbrush also comes with a contoured handle made of soft rubber and plastic for a comfortable cushion grip. Includes 6 toothbrushes with toothbrush caps to protect the bristles. Great for the entire family, these brushes will consistently help maintain oral hygiene daily. Don't just brush, REACH!
